channel.title: Minnesota Homegrown Cookbook - Local Food, Local Restaurants, Local Recipes

item.title: Garrison Keillor Excerpt From Forward
item.description: I can never be a boy again standing barefoot in a garden on a sunny day and hold a ripe tomato in my hand... but this lovely book gives me hope that something beautiful that I thought had passed away has actually come full circle and that other people in Minnesota share this same longing for fresh food.‚Äù
item.dc:creator: kai
